typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Trip ID} as string,
		Duration as integer,
		{Start Date} as string,
		{Start Station} as string,
		{Start Terminal} as string,
		{End Date} as string,
		{End Station} as string,
		{End Terminal} as string,
		{Bike #} as string,
		{Subscriber Type} as string,
		{Zip Code} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 aggregate(groupBy({Start Station}),
	{Trip ID} = count({Trip ID}),
		Duration = avg(Duration)) ~> Aggregate1
source1 aggregate(groupBy({End Station}),
	{Trip ID} = count({Trip ID}),
		Duration = avg(Duration)) ~> Aggregate2
